description:
Renovated Family Home
ANY OFFER WELCOMED!
*Due to Covid-19 restrictions, inspections are strictly appointment only*
Located in a prime area of Lang Lang, this completely renovated family home features 4 bedrooms (3 with BIR's, down lights and ceiling fans). Entering your new home, youre greeted to the comfort of an open plan living and dinning with a split system. Your kitchen is perfect for any chef, with a 900mm stove and stainless appliances. The oversized master bedroom is fit for a king and queen, with a duel entry walk in robe, full ensuite and a split system.
Outside the beautiful home, you have attractive key points such as side access, car port, undercover entertaining and a low maintenance 768m2 block, your new home comes with an in ground swimming pool and an impressive shed, complete with a vehicle hoist!

GRAND EDWARDIAN CHARM IN AN IDYLLIC COASTAL SETTING!
Set on a large 1025m2 allotment, this beautifully appointed 4-bedroom family home presents the classic grand design and charm of the Edwardian era. It is the one of a kind in the quiet coastal town of Corinella, so offers a completely unique lifestyle opportunity.
From the moment you enter the double width hallway of this impressive property, youll be captivated by its soaring ceilings, scale of rooms and the timeless elegance of period features characterising Edwardian architecture.
The entrance hallway passes three capacious bedrooms, superbly styled to suit the setting, each with split-system air conditioning.
The first master bedroom features ensuite, walk-in robe, a delightful single bay window with leadlight and double doors to a private porch. The second and third bedrooms are equally spacious to fit king-size beds and furniture, with large built-in-robes.
Past the staircase is an inviting formal lounge with cosy gas-log fireplace. The hallway finally opens to the magnificent heart of the home, a light-filled, open-plan kitchen/dining/living zone with additional formal dining room adjoining. The kitchen has been fully modernised with stone-topped breakfast bar, five-burner gas stove, dishwasher and split-system air conditioner. Double glass doors open to the deck on two sides, and the back door captures colour through its stained glass.
The rear hallway hides an elegant family bathroom with claw-foot bath and separate laundry with external access.
Upstairs is another master suite featuring walk-in robe and large bathroom with corner spa and stunning stained glass windows. This private space, with split-system air conditioning, provides an ideal retreat with plenty of room for king-size bed plus lounge seating. Currently this room is used as a guest bedroom/rumpus room also housing a billiard table.
Set in an English style garden, with double car port behind lockable gates the property is positioned just 800 metres walk from Corinellas coastal walking track and 400 metres from the general store, park, tennis courts and bowling green.
An inspection is essential to truly appreciate the character and atmosphere of this exclusive home.

Ready Set Build
A fantastic opportunity to join the popular and growing community of Lang Lang.
This is a titled and ready to build corner allotment 674m2 (approx.) All services are available.
This Block merges the best of traditional family living and open spaces. Offering the perfect place to build your new dream home only a short walk to the town centre, public transport, local school and parks. This is a golden opportunity to secure a unique investment.

Spacious family living!
This spacious family home is set on a large 851m2 (approx.) block with plenty of space entertaining and grassy rear yard for the kids to play.
To the front is a family living area or parents retreat, while set to the rear, a large second fanily living & meals zone which flows from the modern kitchen complete with overhead cupboards, dishwasher, gas cooktop & electric oven.
The large master bedroom is complete with walk in robe and ensuite, followed by 3 bedrooms all with built in robes and ceiling fans, plus study or 5th bedroom.
An impressive alfresco area set for all year round entertaining, located close to shops, child care facilities and and local parks, this is one you must inspect.

Taste the Country Air an Minutes to Beach...
COVID -19
Have you or anyone whom you have been in contact, been diagnosed with COVID-19
Full Names, Addresses with Photo ID must be sent to Sales Agent 0437441127 Prior to viewing this property
4 Bedroom Plus Study on 1 Acre! Room for the kids plus Boys & Toys
This marvel of the Bass Coast boasts four bedrooms plus a study or fifth bedroom that was the former local post office. Updated since last offered in neutral tones, it's move-in ready on a whopping 4230 sqm (approx.).
The solid built home is surrounded by soaring natives with bursts of colourful flowers framing a picturesque outdoor living are that overlooks what was once a large farming land hold.
The galley kitchen is fitted with a dishwasher and stainless appliances with plenty benchtop space to prepare meals for a full house of family and friends.
There are plenty of options within the floorplan, where a separate dining and living as well as a massive garden are the backdrop for a lifetime of memories. Get out the bats and balls for cricket, footy, soccer or volleyball, or customise the backyard to suit under shady trees.
All four bedrooms feature built-in robes with the large study easily converting to a bunk room or guest bedroom. The spacious bathroom is perfect for high traffic bedtimes with a double sink as well as separate bath and shower.
The oversized lock-up garage is perfect for watercraft storage, recreational vehicles, a workshop or all three.
Invest in the coastal life seasonally or take the plunge into a healthy lifestyle where there's history still to be made by families that love the great outdoors.
Highlights
• Established acre (approx.) with historic cred
• Four bedrooms with BIRs plus oversized study
• Separate dining and living
• Split system in the dining room
• 2 outdoor living areas
• Galley kitchen with stainless appliances
• Separate dining and living
• Beautiful gardens include huge trees and plenty of flowers
• Low-maintenance landscaping
• Oversized garage ideal for storage
PHOTO ID REQUIRED ON ENRTY

Period Charm With A Stylish Contemporary Polish
An enviable lifestyle awaits the lucky purchaser of 3 Stewart Street a charming period style home, and very close to Grantville beach and Grantville shopping precincts, and public transport.
Designed for easy living this home features fine period details, with a modern contemporary touch, including high ceilings with ornate plaster.
Completely renovated while maintaining its period charm, the home offers 2 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms one also being part of the laundry, modern galley style kitchen with stainless steel appliances.
Polished floorboards throughout the home.
A delightful paved outdoor undercover entertaining area fully fenced back yard, with garden shed.
With so much at your fingertips, Bass Coast Vineyards, 100 meters from the popular Grantville beach. 20 Minutes to the world-famous GP track, Penguin parade and so much more, including a great lifestyle. This property would suit as the ideal permanent home for the whole family or beach holiday home or investment opportunity in the holiday rental space, which is one of the main reasons this property is ideal for any homeowner.
Open for inspections are allowed. Strict health and safety measures are in place.
Call Daniel or Tamara Today to arrange your private viewing or live online video walkthrough.

Clover Cottage
Great views and big shed is only the beginning with this character home in a sought after location in Lang Lang. Currently the property on 836m2 is divided in two with the home comprising open plan living with large living, galley style kitchen, 2 good size bedrooms and modern bathroom. Features include polished boards, ducted heating, split system and outside you have great deck with Million-dollar views and single carport for the car. To the side of property, you have separate gated driveway that leads to a whopping 8 metre x 6 metre lock up garage with high roller door for caravan or boat. The choice is yours keep property as is or remove fence and make it a great property but either way you have a great opportunity in great location.

Better Than New
Less than 12 months old and on a huge 818sqm block, why would you want to build?
With 4 generously-sized bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 living areas plus a study nook, this clever floor plan thought of everything for those with a family.
The stylish and modern kitchen has everything you could want with walk-in pantry, ample bench space, heaps of storage and a dishwasher.
Outside is a great sized back yard , garden shed and outdoor entertaining zone.
All set walking distance to shops, schools, public transport and right across the road from a park!

SIMPLY THE BEST....
Properties of this quality are tightly held as it is, it is even rarer to have something of this calibre presented to the market. This incredibly sought-after location on this fertile Bass River make this the perfect package you have been waiting for.
This incredible opportunity on 105 acres (approx.) awaits. The property comprises of 13 paddocks with 15 metre wide shelter belts of native trees with all-weather laneway, superbly constructed drainage on town water and swap over dam supply to troughs in every paddock and laneway full electric hot wire with cut off system.
The land also boasts two areas of remnant native bush/vegetation under Section 173. All of the work has been done for you with extensive pasture improvements and a long history of organic sustainable fertiliser history.
You'll enjoy quality cattle yards, race and loading ramp. As well as a new 18x12 clearspan shed divided to 6x12 with concrete floor enclosed and 12 x 12 hard stand.
With plenty of idyllic house sites create your own relaxed Victorian coastline living. This quality block is a rare find with many years of care for the land and environment.
This property is proudly presented to you by LJ Hooker Grantville. Call to secure your inspection time today!

FULLY RENOVATED ON A HUGE BLOCK
This stunning home is set on approx. 1016sqm and offers a very comfortable coastal lifestyle within 10 min walk to the foreshore. From the moment you enter the charm and style are obvious, the wide entrance hall, high ceilings, and light floating floors throughout are just the beginning. The spacious sun filled kitchen/living/dining areas are expertly finished and feature timber sash windows, a reverse cycle air conditioner and two sets of French doors which open onto the newly built deck. Large yard space with room for the kids, pets and a shed! If you're looking for future investment potential, there is plenty of room to further subdivide this allotment STCA!

Future potential 860sqm
This well located home sits on 860sqm of land and has been in the same family for over 50yrs. Great corner location with drive thru access, it is perfect for anyone wanting to park a boat, caravan or trailer. Some of the many features include:
- 3 spacious bedrooms, original high ceilings
- Large living area, separate dining room
- 2 car garage, 2 carport, spacious backyard
- Hard to find side access
- Brand new heat pump HWS, solar panels
If you are looking for a property with potential then this could be it. Perfectly suited for an investor or homeowner. Call for a private inspection.

address: 55 Gurdies-st Helier Road The Gurdies VIC 3984
description:
Where Sea Change Meets Tree Change
This stunning property is the epitome of jaw-dropping and awe-inspiring with approx 5.5 acres of luxury but low maintenance gardens, winding paths and so many interesting features that you won't know where to look first. The immaculately planned and executed outdoor creations will leave you feeling surrounded by your own personal sanctuary and the envy of all your friends. Relax, unwind and try to take everything in, you will be left truly wanting more. The home itself is double brick, featuring 3 bedrooms 1 bathroom (plus additional outside laundry/2nd bathroom) with open plan kitchen/living as well as a huge open plan lounge/bar room. This is also one for the car enthusiast with undercover parking for up to 14 cars.
As soon as you drive up the sweeping driveway, you know you are in for something really special as the eyes are treated with more stunning features than you can truly take in. Greeted by large windmills, working water wheels, 2 feature dams and an eclectic collection of trucks, horse-drawn wagons, memorabilia and quirky features, everything here tells a story. A story you'll want to make your own.
The home itself consists of an open plan kitchen, living and dining with sensational timber wagon-wheel window overlooking the gardens. The kitchen has quality cabinetry, beautiful timber bench tops with classic pressed tin splash-backs, dishwasher and lots of storage space. Finished off by a gorgeous 1100 free-standing Falcon stove with dual ovens.
An adjacent open plan lounge/bar room is currently decked out as the ultimate man-cave and entertaining space, with heaps of collectibles (some included, some optional) a second timber wagon-wheel window, rustic bar and character brick flooring. The bedrooms are spacious and bright, including master with a huge walk-behind robe.
The family bathroom is character plus with cast iron bathtub, 2 showers and a stunning timber vanity. An outside laundry also doubles as a second bathroom with old-fashioned pull chain toilet and additional shower.
Outside is where it really pulls at the heartstrings with beautiful meandering pathways leading to more treasures than could possibly be mentioned. Star features include an outdoor bar made from vintage wheels, leading down to an outdoor kitchen/bbq area. A separate building is the entertaining space with feature stonework, fire place and open seating area the perfect combination for entertaining friends, or sitting with a drink and relaxing after work. The outdoor is a stunning combination of trees, open grass areas, beautiful flowers and a huge collection of quirky additions.
This property is also perfect for the car enthusiast or mechanic who works from home with a massive 12x18m shed with 4.3m height, including 4m high doors, heaps of work and storage space and a 4.5tonne hoist, 3 phase power and atatched lock up adjacent shed to keep the tools safe. An addition of a 5 bay machinery shed keeps all the storage items, lawn mower etc out of the garage, leaving all the space for the fun stuff. Still need more? A 4 car carport on the home for the day-to-day cars is also included.
This home is really one to see, and one that years after moving in will keep delivering little things you didn't notice before. Move in, enjoy, discover and create your own postcard property ideally this could also be used as a wedding venue, photography location, a stunning air bnb, or just a beautiful dream home.
Please note: Photo ID is required for all inspections

description:

Escape suburbia and enjoy this beautiful setting!
